body: The problem, apparently, is that inside of my Application.razor file, I was calling back to my front-end server with await response.Content.ReadAsByteArrayAsync() rather than await response.Content.ReadAsAsync<byte[]>(), and you want the LATTER because the former somehow transforms the data in a way you don't necessarily expect, that, when converted to a UTF8 string, looks remarkably like a Base64 string. Strange behaviors abound.
